#summary URL used to update kitchen done flag

= Introduction =

_{domainname}/device/kitchen_done_update.asp?_
This URL is used to update kitchen done flag.

<br>

= Details =

URL parameters are:
{{{
rec_id: Integer - The record ID of the item
}}}

=== Example ===
{{{
http://www.mydomainname.com/device/kitchen_done_update.asp?rec_id=123
}}}
